original_title: An In-Depth Comparison of Hobby PCB Manufacturers
original_content:
[Icamtuf] has been working on a prototyping run of a project, which involves getting PCBs made by several low volume PCB manufacturing companies. After receiving the boards, he analyzed the results and produced an interesting analysis.
The project he is working on is Sir-Box-A-Lot, a Sokoban gaming console clone that weve covered before. It uses an AVR128DA28 microcontroller to emulate the original box-pushing game and drive the OLED display. He ordered PCBs from OSHPark, DigiKey Red, JLCPCB, PCBWay and Aisler.
OSHPark boards are gorgeous, but you pay for it.
There were pros and cons for each of the services: OSHPark produced the nicest-looking boards, but at the highest cost. DigiKey Red had a flawless solder mask, but a rather sloppy-looking silkscreen and shipped the boards covered in adhesive gunk. JLCPCB was fast, shipping the boards in less than 7 days, but the smaller details of the silkscreen were blurry and the solder mask was thinner than the others. The solder mask from PCBWay was very slightly misaligned but was thicker than most, and they were the only ones who queried a badly shaped hole to see what [Icamtuf] wanted to do: the others just made assumptions and made the boards without checking.
To be fair, this analysis is based on a single PCB design ordered once, and it is possible that some companies were having a bad day. So, there are no clear winners and I wouldnt make a choice based on this alone. But the analysis is well worth a read if you want to know what to look out for on your own PCBs.
title: 複数の低出力PCB製造会社で作成したPCBの結果を分析
body: [Icamtuf]は低ボリュームのPCB製造会社からPCBを作成し、その結果を分析しました。各サービスには利点と欠点がありました。OSHParkは見た目が最も良かったが、高価でした。DigiKey Redははんだマスクが完璧だが、シルクスクリーンが雑で、接着剤まみれのボードだった。JLCPCBは迅速だったが、シルクスクリーンの細部がぼやけ、はんだマスクも他の会社より薄かった。PCBWayのはんだマスクはわずかにずれていたが、他の会社とは異なり、問題のある穴の目的を尋ねた。一つのPCB設計に基づく分析なので、明確な勝者はいないが、自分のPCBで何に注意すべきか知りたい場合には価値がある分析です。
titles: 複数の低出力PCB製造会社で作成したPCBの結果を分析
Sir-Box-A-Lotゲームコンソールの開発に関するPCB製造の比較分析
PCB製造会社の選択における利点と欠点の分析
PCBにおける組立と製造に関する重要な詳細の分析
